text: @GregAbbott_TX @JohnCornyn By “ramping up testing”, do you @GregAbbott_TX mean #Texas has moved way “up” to 46th LOWEST per capita #COVID19 testing rate of the 50 states? We all want to re-open, but without MUCH MORE TESTING you’re just releasing asymptomatic virus-spreading people out into the public.
